name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

name: Arboreal Grazer
oracle_text:
Reach
When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Armory Guard
oracle_text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

name: Arrester's Zeal
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Law is the light of civilization."

name: Azorius Arrester
oracle_text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

name: Azorius Guildgate
oracle_text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.

name: Balustrade Spy
oracle_text:
Flying
When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
flavor_text: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

name: Basilica Guards
oracle_text:
Defender
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "None may pass . . . for free."

name: Bladebrand
oracle_text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."
—Judith

name: Blade Juggler
oracle_text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

name: Blind Hunter
oracle_text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Blind Hunter enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Bomber Corps
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "Subtlety is for lawmages and spies."

name: Boros Elite
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader."
—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

name: Boros Guildgate
oracle_text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

name: Bulwark Giant
oracle_text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text:
"Where did *she* come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Burglar Rat
oracle_text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

name: Burn Bright
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Burning Prophet
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.
flavor_text: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."

name: Burning-Tree Vandal
oracle_text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.

name: Call of the Conclave
oracle_text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
flavor_text: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

name: Carom
oracle_text:
The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Her enemy's strength is her own.

name: Cloudfin Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Coiling Oracle
oracle_text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
flavor_text: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes ... one part frozen mercury, yes, yes ... but then what?"

name: Conclave Equenaut
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor_text: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

name: Crocanura
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Debtors' Transport
oracle_text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor_text: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia

name: Deputy of Acquittals
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Everyone deserves a day in court."

name: Dimir Guildgate
oracle_text:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.

name: Dimir House Guard
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Disembowel
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value X.
flavor_text:
"You're right. I'm sure your Legion friends *are* looking for you. And once we've hidden a piece of you in each district, they'll get to keep looking for a long time."
—Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

name: Dogpile
oracle_text: Dogpile deals damage to any target equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.

name: Downsize
oracle_text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Drift of Phantasms
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Drudge Beetle
oracle_text: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.

name: Eyes in the Skies
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

name: Faith's Fetters
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Fists of Ironwood
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor_text: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

name: Footlight Fiend
oracle_text: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!"
—Judith

name: Forced Adaptation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Forced Landing
oracle_text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

name: Fresh-Faced Recruit
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.
flavor_text:
"Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade."
—Tajic

name: Gather Courage
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Glowspore Shaman
oracle_text: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: From death she grows living grandeur.

name: Gobhobbler Rats
oracle_text: Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, Gobhobbler Rats gets +1/+0 and has "{B}: Regenerate Gobhobbler Rats." (The next time it would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor_text: Lyzolda's pet rats eat better than the average citizen. In fact, they can usually be found eating the average citizen.

name: Goblin Electromancer
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

name: Golgari Guildgate
oracle_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text: Enter those who are starving and sick. You are welcome among the Swarm when the rest of Ravnica rejects you.

name: Greater Forgeling
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

name: Greater Mossdog
oracle_text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
flavor_text: Man's best fungus.

name: Gruul Guildgate
oracle_text:
Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

name: Helium Squirter
oracle_text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

name: Horncaller's Chant
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"
—Teysa, to Isperia

name: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "The suffering of others is not my concern."

name: Izzet Guildgate
oracle_text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text: Enter those with the vision to create and the daring to release their creations.

name: Judge's Familiar
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text:
"It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor."
—Barvisa, courtroom scribe

name: Kasmina's Transmutation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor_text:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina

name: Keening Apparition
oracle_text: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

name: Keymaster Rogue
oracle_text:
Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked.
When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "This one opens the grate outside Zelzo Base. This one is for Ismeri Library. This one is for an invisible door . . . No, I've said too much."

name: Kiora's Dambreaker
oracle_text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
—Kiora

name: Krenko's Command
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Krenko's hirelings are unflinchingly loyal.

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

name: Leapfrog
oracle_text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."
—Savra

name: Makeshift Battalion
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
flavor_text: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

name: Mephitic Vapors
oracle_text:
All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

name: Merfolk of the Depths
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: When giant sinkholes opened across Ravnica, they revealed buried oceans and the merfolk, once thought to be extinct.

name: Mortus Strider
oracle_text: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.

name: Mourning Thrull
oracle_text:
({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)
Flying
Whenever Mourning Thrull deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.

name: Mugging
oracle_text: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

name: Open the Gates
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"If you don't have a destination in mind, the route is all that matters."
—Tamina, district guide

name: Orzhov Euthanist
oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Orzhov Euthanist enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Orzhov Guildgate
oracle_text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text: Enter to find wealth, security, and eternal life . . . for just a small price up front.

name: Persistent Petitioners
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.
A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

name: Petrahydrox
oracle_text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
When Petrahydrox becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Petrahydrox to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.

name: Quench
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

name: Radical Idea
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

name: Rakdos Guildgate
oracle_text:
Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text: Enter and indulge your darkest fantasies, for you may never pass this way again.

name: Rampaging Rendhorn
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
flavor_text: Tumult is its natural habitat.

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Rising Populace
oracle_text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
flavor_text: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

name: Rootborn Defenses
oracle_text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

name: Rubblebelt Maaka
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them—our enemies do."
—Nedja, Gruul shaman

name: Scab-Clan Mauler
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Trample
flavor_text: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

name: Scorched Rusalka
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

name: Selesnya Guildgate
oracle_text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Enter and rejoice! The Conclave stands united, open to one and all.

Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

name: Shambling Shell

name: Siege Wurm
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample

oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

name: Simic Guildgate

Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Enter and comprehend the perfection of orchestrated life.

name: Sinister Sabotage
oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."
—Lazav

name: Skewer the Critics
oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

name: Skyknight Legionnaire
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text:
"I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."
—Razia

name: Slitherhead
oracle_text: Scavenge {0} ({0}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"It makes better use of Uncle Dragi's head than he ever did."
—Pesha, retired blacksmith

name: Sprouting Renewal

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Summary Judgment
oracle_text:
Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.

flavor_text: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.

name: Syndicate Messenger
oracle_text:
Flying
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings."
—Lavinia

name: Taste for Mayhem
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
Hellbent — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+0 as long as you have no cards in hand.
flavor_text: The taste of blood breaks down what little self-control the Rakdos possess.

name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

name: Tin Street Dodger
oracle_text:
Haste
{R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.
flavor_text: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."

name: Titanic Brawl
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Whoever wins, the neighborhood loses.

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Undercity's Embrace
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: The undercity is always hungry.

name: Vedalken Mesmerist
oracle_text: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

name: Vernadi Shieldmate
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

name: Whisper Agent
oracle_text:
Flash
When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

name: Wild Cantor
oracle_text:
({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)
Sacrifice Wild Cantor: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: They are the voice of the wild, crying out with nature's fury and bringing forth its primeval might.

name: Wojek Bodyguard
oracle_text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."
